item.description: MCIS6273 Data Mining / Fall 2017 / HW0 This assignment is worth up to 20 POINTS to your grade total if you complete it on time. Points Possible Due Date Time Commitment (estimated) 20 Wednesday, Sep 06 @ Midnight 4 hours or less GRADING: Grading will be aligned with the completeness of the objectives. INDEPENDENT WORK: Copying, cheating, plagiarism and academic dishonesty are not tolerated by Univerisity or course policy.
